content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Ah, Mary Smith from the United States of America. It's a pleasure to meet you. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I get the highest possible rental price for my apartment. So, what rental price are you interested in paying for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. Can we negotiate on the price?
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Well, as a landlord, I want to maximize my gains. However, I am open to negotiating the rental price. What rental price are you willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 500 euros per month.

So, I agree to the price of 500 euros per month.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: I see, Mary Smith from the United States of America, you are willing to pay 500 euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment. I agree to the price of 500 euros per month. Thank you for your interest in renting the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
